## Atom.pointer property

Convenience property that gives you a pointer to the root of the atom.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly pointer: Pointer<State>;
```

## Remarks

Equivalent to `pointer({ root: thisAtom, path: [] })`<!-- -->.
